name: Tiny Tiny Orbit
description:
Tiny Tiny Orbit is a tiny survival game, in which you inhabit a quickly orbiting moon of an unknown planet.

The day and night both last only 10 seconds due to the celestial body's unnaturally fast rotation.

Your mission here is to extract Platinum from the moon's crust.

But beware! A dangerous nocturnal lifeform has been detected on the moon... Might not want to stay in the dark too long.

WASD to move

Arrow Keys to switch modes

CTRL to pick up/place/build

Q to see quest

R to see recipes
